assumption.assumption: Sensor data is assumed to be correct unless manipulated by an attacker
The bus connection to the ECU offers both diagnostic capabilities (the OEM) as well as communication with other ECUs.
Bosch insiders (e.g., personnel, developers, project managers and solution providers involved in this project) are trusted to the extent that they are authorized
Physical security and safety of the devices is the responsibility of the customer
assumption.assumption_comment: Physical security and safety of the device must be ensured by customer. Physical access of devices must be monitored and controlled by customer.

assumption.assumption: Third party software / libraries / API are trusted and are compatible, that is, when integrated with the TOE do not endanger it.
Diagnosis will be performed only through trusted hardware an trustworthy personal

misuse.muc_description: Attacker injects unauthorized messages into the CAN bus, aiming to manipulate vehicle functions or deceive other ECUs.
Sniffing communication between Scan tool and vehicle using CAN analyzer.
Attacker captures legitimate messages on the CAN bus and then replays them later.
Attacker scans the CAN bus for vulnerable nodes, that are susceptible to spoofing or replay attacks.
Attacker sends malicious messages on the CAN bus, pretending to be a legitimate node.
Consuming memory by dumping large files through BLE communication
misuse.muc_comment: Maxing out limited on-board persistent memory

misuse.muc_description: Service person loads undesirable content through BLE communication
Manipulate the firmware through OTA using Bluetooth
Connecting to device from illegitimate mobile application
Sniffing the bluetooth communication between the device and mobile
Access stored personal data in solution using BLE communication
Cloning the database of by sniffing BLE communication
An attacker hacks into the device via BLE to change the sensetive data
misuse.muc_comment: Hacking the solution via unsecure BLE comm.

damageScenario.consequence_DS: An unreliable in-vehicle communication could affect the signals from the brake system ECU to the related actuators. This would mean a limitation of the braking functionality and could lead to a crash.
damageScenario.consequence_reasoning:
In a crash human safety could be severely affected leading to loss/losses of life.
Damage to the car / passenger or third parties

damageScenario.damage_scenario: Degradation or disruption or loss of functionality or unreliable operation
damageScenario.consequence_DS: There is a chance of functional or operational degradation due to manipulation of data or application itself.
damageScenario.consequence_reasoning:
Services are affected but can be restored within a toleratable period of time
Functionality is key user requirement and loss of functionality will lead to loss of customer trust and contracting partners

damageScenario.consequence_DS: Services are affected but can be restored within a toleratable period of time

Research effort expended in developing Bosch IP is lost.
